direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add options to the Options instance, but addOptionGroup handles OptionGroup while addOption handles individual Option.
Both methods involve adding multiple options to the Options instance, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods add options with specific requirements, but addRequiredOption directly sets the option as required, while addOptionGroup handles the requirement through the OptionGroup.
Both methods interact with the optionGroups map, with addOptionGroup adding to it and getOptionGroup retrieving from it.
Both methods depend on the optionGroups map, with addOptionGroup modifying it and getOptionGroups retrieving its contents.
